title: fix(android): some android animations performance issue
message:
fix(android): some android animations performance issue

Layout animations are hard to integrate with React Native `Modal`
component, it would block the whole thread. Some we need to do some
workaround.

- Remove `flex: 1` on Schedule `Cell` for display properly
- Remove layout animation in `ScheduleList`
- Remove layout animation in `Filter`
- Remove layout animation in `About`

title: fix: new props `isModal` to eliminate extra height
message:
fix: new props `isModal` to eliminate extra height

The different state of statusbar would create extra height for header if
we present this header with Offical `Modal` component. Therefore, we
should pass `isMoal` to let Header knows if it should eliminate the
extra height or not.

title: feat: detail `Description` component for Event
message:
feat: detail `Description` component for Event

There is a hack for iOS platform. We cannot figure out why the
`WebView#onLoadEnd` did not call at the expeced timing. Actually, it
nevet be called. We call `Description#_onLoadEnd` manually to trigger
the process when the render-to-markdown button pressed. We may inspect
this problem someday.

title: fix: use momentjs instead of Web API for `Date`
message:
fix: use momentjs instead of Web API for `Date`

The `Date` API acts differently in iOS 8.3 or lower.

title: fix: `TouchableOpacity` prevent further nested responders
message:
fix: `TouchableOpacity` prevent further nested responders

`ScrollView` inside our modal `SpeakerView` cannot receive any guesture
event. The reason is tht the topmost `TouchableWithoutFeedback` and
`TouchableOpacity` blocking all events. To solve this issue, we modify
the relationship of the two view from top-down to siblings.

title: feat: use `Redux` for state management
message:
feat: use `Redux` for state management

The reason of this decision is that we need to catch up the trend, so
functional programming style is always welcome.

Here are changes in this commit:

- Redux adoption
- Two actions & two reducers share the same names
  - `fetchSchedule`
  - `selectDate`
- One container: ScheduleList

title: fix(API): rename module & modify output shape
message:
fix(API): rename module & modify output shape

Object shape should be as flat as an relational database. Nested objects
area not preferable. Hence, we use new function to process the data.
